column2: BRIEF-Avalonbay Communities Inc Says CEO Timothy Naughton's FY 2019 Total Compensation Was $10.9 Mln March 20 (Reuters) - AvalonBay Communities Inc: * AVALONBAY COMMUNITIES INC SAYS CEO TIMOTHY NAUGHTONâ€™S FY 2019 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $10.9 MILLION VERSUS $10.1 MILLION IN FY 2018 - SEC FILING * AVALONBAY COMMUNITIES INC SAYS ESTIMATED RATIO OF CEO PAY TO PAY OF MEDIAN EMPLOYEE IS 154 TO 1 Source text : (bit.ly/3dgabvh) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Avalonbay Communities Inc Q1 Core FFO Per Share $2.18 April 25 (Reuters) - AvalonBay Communities Inc: * AVALONBAY COMMUNITIES, INC. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 OPERATING RESULTS * QTRLY FUNDS FROM OPERATIONS ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS PER SHARE INCREASED 6.4% TO $2.17 * Q2 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $2.21 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
